Build ID: M20070212-1330 Steps To Reproduce: 1. Start Eclipse with "-debug -verbose -consoleLog" options 2. Open Console View 3. Open a TclConsole. Note, the following entry and stack trace is output to the console/.log: 
!ENTRY org.eclipse.jface 4 0 2007-04-05 15:35:45.256
!MESSAGE The command ("id1") is undefined
!STACK 0

More information: I eliminated this trace by removing ', "id1"' from ScriptConsolePage:55 and ScriptConsolePage:60, then refactoring the referenced constructors to not require that parameter.
